text: Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu u shesty dnyakh - ta Yoho (earthly) oblast π povnistyu vmila nakryta z vodoyu aby vyprobuvaty vas, shchob rozriznyty ts sered vas kotrykh pratsyuyete righteousness. Dosi, koly vy kazhete, "Vy budete resurrected pislya smerti," tsey khto disbelieve by skazav, "Tse yasno witchcraft
